details.sectionContent: PUBG Mobile is a Battel royal multiplayer Game. Full form of PUBG is Player Unkown’s Battelground.

A number of people are released onto an island, the last person standing wins. To do that you got to find weapons, kill people you see & avoid danger.Each match pits about 100 people against each other, some of which can be in teams while others will be going in alone. Winners receive their prestigious ‘winner winner chicken dinner’, title.
In this round 4 matches will take place. Each match will contain 25 squads. 400 people i.e. 100 squads will enter in Arena. 50 squads will qualify to next round.
2 Matches will take place. 200 people i.e. 50 squads will enter in Arena. Out of which 25 squads will qualify to  next round.
This is a final round I.e. only 1 match will take place. 25 squads will enter and we will have our Winner and Runner Up
It can be of 1-man, 2-man, 3-man OR 4-man SQUAD.
